name: NCORE
storyline:
The year is 2070, and the entire world is captivated by the most popular show, NCORE, where the gladiators of a new era step into the arena and fight to the death for a chance at wealth, eternal glory, and the adoration of the crowd.

But outside the arena, the world is a place of ruthless competition, extreme inequality, and untamed chaos. Giant corporations and the ultra-wealthy have seized all power, acting with impunity to serve their own interests, leaving the majority of the population struggling to survive.

This drives people from all over the world to risk everything and participate in the NCORE show. The competition is fierce, and only the best of the best earn a chance to prove themselves in the arena.

All participants must undergo a special procedure, where their consciousness is transferred into a highly durable and powerful synthetic body. It is in this form that they perform on the battlefield.

With each passing year, more and more gladiators enter the fray, driving the show’s ratings to unprecedented heights. But for the creators of NCORE, this is still not enough. They continue sending scouts to seek out new, unpolished gems.

They are not just looking for fighters—they are seeking superstars, those who will captivate and keep the entire world glued to their screens.
summary:
This is a free PvPvE multi-arena shooter in the format of an entertainment show.

Fight alongside your teammates in a virtual multi-arena for the right to become NCORE champions! Your task is to eliminate opponents and collect as many coins as possible or prevent other teams from doing so. You can move between hexes, raid bosses, ambush other players, or charge straight into battle. Plan your strategy carefully and do whatever it takes to win in NCORE!
